title: Farmacy Health Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Organic, Juice bar
description: A cafe/restaurant/smoothie and juice bar aimed at curing ailments through nutritious foods and alkaline juices, raw food, including many vegan options. Serves soups, sandwiches, Ono plates and bowls, acai bowls and much more. Owner uses local, organic produce grown on Maui, as well as local ingredients like poi and sugarcane.
